standup.title: Today I'm thankful
standup.summary: Share one thing you're thankful for today
standup.description: The world, and even work, can be quite negative sometimes. Take a moment to focus on the positive. Is there something or someone in your life or at work that you are thankful for? This is a great opportunity to recognise our team members for what they do for us.
benefits: It's good to focus on the positive sometimes
We often forget to say thank you to others
You'll learn a bit more about what's important to your teammates
